Text: Mums the word the new Palm handheld is wireless Dear Jess Now we can tell you what youve been waiting to hear Its handsome Its wireless Its lightweight And when it arrives soon the newest Palmtm handheld will give you some very impressive professional communication features So when youre out of the office youll stay connected As a valued Palmtm handheld user you can stake your claim now through the Palm Store Of course no payment is required until you purchase But supplies are limited and its first come first served so be sure to click below and well set one aside for you You can have it in your hands hours after the launch So stay tuned Click here to reserve the newest Palmtm handheld productreservationsdynisZVae The Palm Team To unsubscribe from future email communications regarding Palms upcoming product announcement click below or simply reply to this message with unsubscribe as the subject line of the message You may still receive other communications from Palm which you have previously requested unsubdynisZVae C Palm Inc All rights reserved udlEefRXWZecpRK Palmcom udpkefRXWZecpRP Palm Store udpkefRXWZecpRE InSync Online insyncdynisZVae
